subject: Baseball
Umpires
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Kibler was at first base for Game 6 of the 1986 Series between the Mets and the Red Sox, which the Mets famously won when Mookie Wilson’s ground ball rolled between Buckner’s legs.
